column5: Well.......Toskala standing on his head again......... Fergie states whats what with the nucleus of youth and..........AND... What he wanted to to do and was not given the AUTHORITY to do so with?????????? I believe it.  Your thoughts?????????
My thoughts... can't believe they didn't put a gag order on him if he expected to be paid out his contract.

Keep Kaberle and trade everything else you get an offer on. If you dont  blow this thing up all the way you will continue to mire in mediocrisy. Go to the OHL and grab as many standup guys as you can get.....works for the ducks!
